attributes.action: present an Act to protect organisations from litigation claims arisng from "letting children play"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more organisations and authorities are imposing draconian and nanny state measures to prevent children from being children and playing, eg the banning of "tag" chase in school playgrounds. This can only be due to fear of litigation from some parents who blame others for the natural occurrence of accidents. Of course any Act does not excuse wilful negligence to make environments and supervision safe as is practicable.
